messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Game making CD ROM
messages.msgSnippet: Was it on this list that someone was looking for a CD ROM that would allow their son to make his own games?  If not I ll post on the other list LOL. My boys
messages.messageBody:
Was it on this list that someone was looking for a CD ROM that would allow
their son to make his own games? If not I'll post on the other list LOL.

My boys found one that is called, Warcraft III. It has a world editor on it.
It is sort of like other games in that you have preprogrammed buildings and
terrain features with units etc but on this one you can edit all of the above
to change weapons, color, range, and all the other features. They really are
enjoying it.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
